name: Chat Style File
summary: Learn about .SKYPECHATSTYLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Using Skype on a Mac you can customize the default SKYPECHATSTYLE file. Also, you can add other user-generated styles. You can access the SKYPECHATSTYLE file by right-clicking the Skype application in the Applications folder then selecting Show Package Contents then Contents → Resources → ChatStyles.
NOTE: Related to .SKYPEEMOTICONSET files referenced by Skype.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
